name: NATIONAL TRUST FOR HISTORIC PRESERVATION
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to the funding of the Historic Preservation Fund, and funding for the repair and rehabilitation of facilities within the National Park Service, specifically S.751 and H.R.2584.
